data.title: Local current time of Castille and Leon, Spain, Europe
data.meta_description: Find the current and exact local time of Castille and Leon, Spain, Europe, the sunrise and sunset time and the corresponding time zone.
data.text:
What is the time zone of Castille and Leon, Spain? The answer is Europe/Madrid.

The current time of Castille and Leon, Spain has a difference of 2 hours compared to the Greenwich Mean Time zone (GMT) at a longitude of 0 degree.

Geographic coordinates of Europe/Madrid

Latitude: 40.4

Longitude: -3.68334

Sun relative's information

The following informations are estimates of the appearance and disappearance of the upper edge or upper limb of the Sun circle. They are based on the sunrise and sunset of the time zone's geographical coordinates. As the land is not always regular, it's practically impossible to get the exact time of the viewer's sun vision.

Sunrise

The sun will rise at 07:30:33

Solar noon

Sun will reach his highest point at 14:18:07

Sunset

21:05:41

Sunshine's hours

13:35:08
